column9: broke down his already depressed heart. He threw the book from him
column10: and burst into a flood of tears."Joachim! have you drawn him? What makes you cry?""I cannot draw him
column12: sobbed the distressed boy.And why not? Just look here; here is an admirable likeness of squinting Joe
column13: as you have named him. Why cannot you draw the handsome boy?""Because his face is so handsome!" answered Joachim
